dct_title_s: Cataloniae principatus novissima et accurata descriptio
dct_alternative_sm: Cataloniae principatvs novissima et accvrata descriptio
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Scala leucarum... Lleagues... Milles... Millas."
Decorative cartouches, including figures, coat of arms, descriptive text in lower right, compass rose, ship and sea monster.
From Ortelius' Theatrum orbis terrarum, 1619, published by Vrients after Ortelius' death.
